theme.Question: Which TV show stars Bryan Cranston as a high school chemistry teacher turned meth manufacturer?
theme.Explanation: Breaking Bad aired from 2008 to 2013 and is hailed as one of the greatest television series of all time, earning 16 Primetime Emmy Awards.

theme.Question: In the show 'The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel,' what is Midge Maisel's profession?
theme.Explanation: Midge Maisel, portrayed by Rachel Brosnahan, discovers her knack for comedy after her husband leaves her and becomes a successful stand-up comedian in the 1950s.

theme.Question: Which TV show features a group of friends living in New York City and revolves around their personal and professional lives?
theme.Explanation: Friends aired from 1994 to 2004 and remains popular for its iconic characters, memorable catchphrases, and relatable storylines.

theme.Question: What is the name of the bar in the television series 'Cheers'?
theme.Explanation: 'Cheers' is set in the Cheers bar, where the main characters, including Sam Malone and Diane Chambers, form enduring relationships amidst comedic mishaps.

theme.Question: Who plays the lead role in the TV show 'Orange is the New Black'?
theme.Explanation: Taylor Schilling portrays Piper Chapman, a woman incarcerated in a women's federal prison, in the acclaimed comedy-drama series.

theme.Question: In which TV show does a high school teacher start cooking and selling meth after being diagnosed with cancer?
theme.Explanation: 'Weeds' stars Mary-Louise Parker as a suburban widow who turns to selling marijuana to support her family. The show blends comedy and drama.

theme.Question: Which TV show follows the lives of a group of high school students in a fictional town called Capeside?
theme.Explanation: Dawson's Creek, known for its coming-of-age storytelling, features characters navigating friendship, love, and dreams as they transition into adulthood.

theme.Question: Who plays the lead role in the TV show 'Scrubs'?
theme.Explanation: Zach Braff portrays John 'J.D.' Dorian, a young doctor navigating the challenges of medical residency while forming lasting bonds with colleagues and patients.

theme.Question: In which TV show does a chemistry teacher turn to producing and selling meth with a former student?
theme.Explanation: Breaking Bad's Walter White, portrayed by Bryan Cranston, descends into the criminal underworld alongside former student Jesse Pinkman, brilliantly portrayed by Aaron Paul.

theme.Question: Which TV show centers around a woman who starts to work as a bartender after her husband files for divorce?
theme.Explanation: Courteney Cox stars as Jules Cobb in 'Cougar Town,' a comedy-drama series that humorously explores the complexities of relationships and adult friendships.

theme.Question: In which TV show does a woman navigate the challenges of being a single mother while pursuing a career in stand-up comedy?
theme.Explanation: Rachel Brosnahan's character, Midge Maisel, breaks free from societal norms to pursue her passion for comedy in an era when it was uncommon for women to perform stand-up.

theme.Question: Who plays the lead in the TV show 'Glee' as the passionate high school Spanish teacher?
theme.Explanation: Matthew Morrison takes on the role of Will Schuester, who revives the school's glee club and fosters the talents of the students in 'Glee.'

theme.Question: In which TV show does a mother manipulate her son to rise to power in the drug cartel she leads?
theme.Explanation: 'Animal Kingdom' intricately weaves family dynamics and criminal activity, with Smurf Cody, portrayed by Ellen Barkin, at the helm of the criminal organization.

theme.Question: Which TV show revolves around a choir director who aims to win national competitions with his choir group?
theme.Explanation: The vibrant and melodic journey of Will Schuester, played by Matthew Morrison, in 'Glee' captures the exploration and celebration of individuality and talent.

theme.Question: Who portrays the cynical and witty tech executive in the TV show 'The IT Crowd'?
theme.Explanation: Richard Ayoade shines as Maurice Moss, the quirky and knowledgeable member of the IT department, in the British comedy-drama 'The IT Crowd.'

theme.Question: In which show does a group of friends navigate the complexities of adult life in the city of San Francisco?
theme.Explanation: 'Looking' chronicles the lives of three friends, exploring themes of love, friendship, and identity, while navigating the vibrant backdrop of San Francisco.

theme.Question: Who is the creator of the television series 'The Mindy Project' and also portrays the lead character?
theme.Explanation: Mindy Kaling brings to life Dr. Mindy Lahiri, an accomplished obstetrician navigating the challenges of love, career, and friendships, in 'The Mindy Project.'

theme.Question: In which TV show does a former lawyer start a new career as a high school science teacher?
theme.Explanation: 'Better Call Saul' serves as a prequel to 'Breaking Bad' and delves into the transformation of Jimmy McGill, portrayed by Bob Odenkirk, into the infamous lawyer Saul Goodman.

theme.Question: Who plays Selina Meyer, the Vice President and later President of the United States, in the TV show 'Veep'?
theme.Explanation: Julia Louis-Dreyfus's portrayal of Selina Meyer in 'Veep' earned her numerous awards, including six consecutive Primetime Emmy Awards for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series.
